sys_script_include.description: to load the invoice items details to the proposal form/table
sys_script_include.name: ToLoadInvoiceItems

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_77e9e5f0974971102b9e76771153af16
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_427498_abis.ToLoadInvoiceItems</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>to load the invoice items details to the proposal form/table</description><name>ToLoadInvoiceItems</name><script><![CDATA[var ToLoadInvoiceItems = Class.create();
ToLoadInvoiceItems.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	invoiceItem: function(){
		gs.info("I am in SI");
		var item = this.getParameter("sysparm_item_detail");
		
		var gritem = new Gliderecord('x_427498_abis_invoice_item');
		gritem.get('sys_id' , item);

		// to return the data
		var result = {
			"item": gritem.getDisplayValue('u_description')
		};
		return JSON.stringify(result);
	},

	type: 'ToLoadInvoiceItems'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-31 17:08:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>77e9e5f0974971102b9e76771153af16</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ToLoadInvoiceItems</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ABiS" source="x_427498_abis">269ad56c47332110ff8e8a88536d4359</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="ABiS">269ad56c47332110ff8e8a88536d4359</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_77e9e5f0974971102b9e76771153af16</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-31 20:27:27</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
